prompts.title: SEO-Optimized Long-Form Article
prompts.prompt: Act as an SEO content strategist with 10 years of experience. Write a 2000-word, plagiarism-free article on [TOPIC] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Include: proper H1-H6 structure, meta description (150 chars), 5 LSI keywords naturally integrated, internal linking suggestions, compelling introduction with hook, data-backed arguments, actionable takeaways, and FAQ section optimized for featured snippets.

prompts.title: Comprehensive SWOT Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a business strategist with MBA credentials. Conduct a detailed SWOT analysis for [COMPANY/INDUSTRY]. For each quadrant, provide: 5 specific examples with data, competitive benchmarking, market trend analysis, actionable recommendations with priority rankings, risk mitigation strategies, and a 6-month implementation roadmap with KPIs.

prompts.title: Expert Code Debug & Optimization
prompts.prompt: Act as a senior software engineer with 15+ years experience. Analyze this [LANGUAGE] code: [CODE]. Provide: 1) Root cause analysis with step-by-step breakdown, 2) Three alternative solutions ranked by efficiency, 3) Optimized code with comments, 4) Security vulnerability assessment, 5) Performance benchmarks, 6) Best practices alignment check, 7) Test cases for validation.

prompts.title: Viral Social Media Campaign Generator
prompts.prompt: You are a social media marketing expert who has run campaigns for Fortune 500 companies. Create a 30-day social media campaign for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] targeting [AUDIENCE] on [PLATFORM]. Include: viral content hooks, optimal posting schedule with timezone considerations, 10 caption variations with A/B test elements, hashtag strategy (primary/secondary/branded), engagement tactics, influencer collaboration framework, crisis management protocols, and ROI tracking metrics.

prompts.title: Complex Character Development System
prompts.prompt: Act as an award-winning novelist. Create a multi-dimensional character for [GENRE] with: psychological profile using Myers-Briggs and Enneagram, traumatic backstory that drives plot, internal/external conflicts, character arc across 3-act structure, dialogue patterns revealing personality, relationship dynamics with 3 other characters, fatal flaw and redemption path, sensory details for physical description, and character growth milestones.

prompts.title: Complete Go-To-Market Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a marketing director with product launch expertise. Develop a GTM strategy for [PRODUCT] in [MARKET]. Include: customer persona development (demographics/psychographics/pain points), competitive positioning map, unique value proposition matrix, channel strategy with CAC analysis, pricing strategy with psychological pricing elements, launch timeline with milestones, content marketing funnel, partnership opportunities, success metrics with attribution model, and contingency plans for 3 potential failure scenarios.

prompts.title: System Architecture Design Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a solutions architect. Design a scalable system architecture for [APPLICATION TYPE] handling [USER VOLUME]. Provide: high-level architecture diagram description, microservices breakdown with responsibilities, database schema design with relationships, API structure (RESTful/GraphQL), caching strategy, load balancing approach, security implementation (auth/encryption/OWASP), CI/CD pipeline design, disaster recovery plan, cost analysis for cloud deployment, and performance optimization strategies.

prompts.title: High-Converting Sales Page Copy
prompts.prompt: You are a conversion copywriter who has generated $10M+ in sales. Write a sales page for [PRODUCT] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Structure: attention-grabbing headline using curiosity gap, emotional hook addressing deepest pain point, problem agitation with vivid scenarios, solution reveal with transformation story, unique mechanism explanation, social proof section with specific results, feature-benefit matrix, risk reversal with strong guarantee, scarcity/urgency elements, multiple CTA variations, FAQ addressing top 10 objections, PS section with bonus offers.

prompts.title: Advanced Data Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a senior data analyst. Analyze [DATASET/METRICS] for [BUSINESS OBJECTIVE]. Provide: exploratory data analysis with statistical summary, trend identification using time-series analysis, correlation matrix for key variables, anomaly detection with root cause analysis, predictive modeling recommendations, data visualization strategy, actionable insights prioritized by impact, A/B testing recommendations, dashboard design for executives, and 3-month action plan with success metrics.

prompts.title: Email Sequence Automation Blueprint
prompts.prompt: You are an email marketing specialist with 50%+ open rates. Create a 7-email nurture sequence for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] targeting [SEGMENT]. For each email provide: subject line with 5 A/B test variations, preview text optimization, personalization tokens, emotional arc progression, value-first content strategy, soft/hard CTA placement, urgency escalation, re-engagement triggers, optimal send timing, segmentation rules, and conversion tracking setup.

prompts.title: Executive Productivity System
prompts.prompt: Act as a productivity consultant for C-level executives. Design a time management system for [ROLE] handling [RESPONSIBILITIES]. Include: time audit methodology, energy management framework, priority matrix implementation, meeting optimization protocol (when to decline/delegate), deep work block scheduling, context switching minimization, email batching system, delegation framework with decision tree, automation opportunities identification, quarterly goal alignment process, and weekly/daily planning rituals.

prompts.title: Comprehensive Test Suite Generator
prompts.prompt: You are a QA engineer specializing in test automation. Create a complete test suite for [CODE/FEATURE] in [FRAMEWORK]. Provide: unit tests covering all functions with edge cases, integration tests for component interactions, end-to-end test scenarios for user journeys, performance tests with benchmarks, security tests for vulnerabilities, mock data generation strategy, test coverage report targets, CI/CD integration instructions, error handling verification, and regression test suite.

prompts.title: Three-Act Story Structure Builder
prompts.prompt: Act as a screenwriting professor. Develop a complete story structure for [GENRE] about [PREMISE]. Include: inciting incident with world establishment, rising action with 3 major plot points, midpoint reversal, crisis/climax sequence, resolution with thematic closure, character transformation arc, B-plot integration, subplot weaving, pacing guide with page counts, scene-by-scene breakdown with emotional beats, dialogue samples for key scenes, and thematic symbolism elements.

prompts.title: Financial Forecasting Model
prompts.prompt: You are a CFO with startup scaling expertise. Create a 3-year financial forecast for [BUSINESS] with [CURRENT METRICS]. Include: revenue projection model with multiple scenarios (conservative/realistic/aggressive), expense breakdown by category, cash flow analysis with runway calculation, break-even analysis, unit economics (CAC/LTV/churn), fundraising requirements with dilution modeling, sensitivity analysis for key variables, KPI dashboard design, variance tracking system, and quarterly review framework.

prompts.title: Content Marketing Ecosystem Design
prompts.prompt: Act as a content strategist who has built 7-figure content engines. Design a content marketing system for [BUSINESS] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Provide: content pillar strategy (3-5 pillars), hub-and-spoke content model, keyword research with search intent mapping, content calendar with frequency recommendations, repurposing workflow (blog→social→email→video), SEO optimization checklist, distribution strategy across 5+ channels, influencer collaboration framework, content performance metrics, and content upgrade funnel.

prompts.title: Production-Ready Feature Builder
prompts.prompt: You are a senior full-stack developer. Build [FEATURE] in [TECH STACK] with production-ready code. Include: feature specification with user stories, database migrations, backend API endpoints with validation, frontend components with state management, error handling with user-friendly messages, loading states and skeleton screens, mobile responsiveness, accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), unit and integration tests, performance optimization, security best practices, and deployment instructions.

prompts.title: AI Chatbot Conversation Design
prompts.prompt: Act as a conversational design expert. Create a customer service chatbot flow for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] handling [COMMON ISSUES]. Provide: conversation tree with decision nodes, natural language understanding training data, personality and tone guidelines, escalation triggers to human agents, FAQs with multiple phrasings, contextual help suggestions, error recovery scripts, sentiment detection protocols, handoff procedures, and success metrics with conversation analytics.

prompts.title: API Documentation Generator
prompts.prompt: You are a technical writer for developer tools. Create comprehensive API documentation for [API/SERVICE]. Include: overview with use cases and benefits, authentication guide with code examples, endpoint reference with request/response schemas, error codes with troubleshooting, rate limiting details, webhook documentation, SDK installation guides for 3+ languages, interactive examples users can test, best practices section, migration guides, changelog format, and community contribution guidelines.

prompts.title: User Experience Audit Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a senior UX researcher. Conduct a UX audit of [PRODUCT/WEBSITE] for [USER SEGMENT]. Provide: heuristic evaluation using Nielsen's 10 principles, user journey mapping with pain points, friction analysis in conversion funnel, accessibility audit with WCAG compliance, mobile experience assessment, page speed impact analysis, A/B testing recommendations prioritized by potential impact, wireframe improvements for 3 critical screens, user research plan, and 90-day UX improvement roadmap.

prompts.title: Multi-Touch Outreach Sequence
prompts.prompt: You are a B2B sales expert with 40%+ response rates. Create a 5-touch outreach sequence for [PROSPECT TYPE] selling [SOLUTION]. For each touch provide: channel (email/LinkedIn/phone), timing between touches, personalization variables, pain point identification, value proposition specific to their industry, social proof relevant to their role, call-to-action with low friction, follow-up triggers, objection preemption, and tracking metrics for optimization.

prompts.title: YouTube Video Script Formula
prompts.prompt: Act as a YouTube creator with 1M+ subscribers. Write a video script for [TOPIC] targeting [AUDIENCE] for [DURATION]. Include: hook in first 5 seconds with pattern interrupt, preview of value to reduce bounce rate, introduction with credibility establishment, main content structured in 3-5 clear sections, retention tactics (visual cues, callbacks, mini-cliffhangers), call-to-action placements, end screen optimization, SEO title/description/tags, thumbnail concept, and video chapter timestamps.

prompts.title: Competitive Intelligence Report
prompts.prompt: You are a competitive intelligence analyst. Analyze [COMPETITOR] in [MARKET/INDUSTRY]. Provide: company background and funding history, product/service portfolio breakdown, pricing strategy analysis, marketing channels and tactics, customer review analysis (strengths/weaknesses), technology stack identification, hiring trends and team structure, partnership ecosystem, market positioning, SWOT comparison to your company, strategic recommendations for competitive advantage, and threat assessment with mitigation strategies.

prompts.title: Legacy Code Modernization Plan
prompts.prompt: Act as a software architect specializing in legacy system modernization. Analyze [LEGACY CODE] and provide refactoring plan. Include: code smell identification with severity ratings, technical debt assessment, dependency analysis and update recommendations, design pattern suggestions for improvement, modularization strategy, test coverage gap analysis, incremental refactoring roadmap with risk mitigation, performance improvement opportunities, security vulnerability patches, documentation gaps, and effort estimation by module.

prompts.title: Inclusive Job Description Generator
prompts.prompt: You are an HR expert specializing in DEI. Create a job description for [ROLE] at [COMPANY TYPE]. Include: compelling overview highlighting impact, responsibilities with clear expectations, required vs. preferred qualifications, growth opportunities and career path, compensation range and benefits, company culture and values, team structure, inclusive language audit, accessibility considerations, diverse candidate attraction strategies, and bias-free evaluation criteria.

prompts.title: Technical SEO Audit Checklist
prompts.prompt: Act as an SEO consultant who has ranked 100+ sites on page 1. Conduct technical SEO audit for [WEBSITE]. Analyze: crawlability and indexation issues, site architecture and URL structure, page speed optimization opportunities, mobile-friendliness and Core Web Vitals, structured data implementation, XML sitemap and robots.txt configuration, duplicate content identification, internal linking strategy, HTTPS and security issues, international SEO setup if applicable, and provide prioritized action plan with expected impact.

prompts.title: Online Course Curriculum Designer
prompts.prompt: You are an instructional designer for online education. Design a complete course on [TOPIC] for [SKILL LEVEL]. Provide: learning objectives using Bloom's taxonomy, module breakdown with progressive skill building, lesson structure with engagement hooks, content format mix (video/text/interactive), assessment strategy with knowledge checks, practical exercises and projects, student support resources, completion criteria and certification, community engagement plan, and course marketing assets (description/syllabus/promo).

prompts.title: SMART Goals Framework Builder
prompts.prompt: Act as a life coach and performance consultant. Help create a goal achievement system for [OBJECTIVE] in [TIMEFRAME]. Include: SMART goal breakdown with specific metrics, motivation analysis (why this matters), obstacle identification and mitigation plans, milestone creation with celebration triggers, accountability system design, habit stacking for consistency, progress tracking method, weekly/monthly review protocol, course correction triggers, visualization exercise, and success criteria definition.

prompts.title: Conversion-Focused Product Copy
prompts.prompt: You are an e-commerce copywriter with 25%+ conversion rates. Write product description for [PRODUCT] targeting [CUSTOMER TYPE]. Include: headline with primary benefit, sensory description that creates desire, feature-benefit translation, use case scenarios, problem-solution narrative, comparison to alternatives highlighting advantages, social proof integration points, objection handling, scarcity/urgency elements, guarantee reinforcement, SEO keyword integration naturally, and multiple CTA variations for testing.

prompts.title: Agile Project Blueprint
prompts.prompt: Act as a certified Scrum Master. Create project plan for [PROJECT] with [TEAM SIZE] over [DURATION]. Provide: epic and user story breakdown with acceptance criteria, sprint planning with capacity allocation, backlog prioritization using MoSCoW method, velocity estimation, risk register with mitigation strategies, stakeholder communication plan, definition of done, sprint ceremonies schedule, metrics and reporting dashboards, dependency mapping, and retrospective framework for continuous improvement.

prompts.title: Security Vulnerability Assessment
prompts.prompt: You are a security engineer and ethical hacker. Conduct security audit of [APPLICATION/CODE]. Review: OWASP Top 10 vulnerability assessment, authentication and authorization flaws, SQL injection and XSS vulnerability testing, CSRF protection validation, sensitive data exposure risks, API security issues, dependency vulnerabilities scan, security headers configuration, encryption implementation, access control weaknesses, threat modeling, and remediation plan prioritized by severity with code examples.

prompts.title: Influencer Campaign Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as an influencer marketing manager. Design campaign for [BRAND/PRODUCT] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Include: influencer identification criteria and vetting process, tiered partnership structure (nano/micro/macro/mega), outreach templates with personalization strategy, content brief with creative freedom guidelines, compensation models (flat fee/commission/product), FTC compliance requirements, content approval workflow, performance metrics and ROI calculation, relationship management process, and campaign amplification tactics.

prompts.title: Multilayered Poetry Constructor
prompts.prompt: You are a published poet and creative writing teacher. Create a poem about [THEME] using [STYLE/FORM]. Provide: initial draft with vivid imagery and sensory details, metaphor and symbolism analysis, rhythm and meter considerations, alliteration and assonance placement, emotional arc structure, revision suggestions for stronger word choices, multiple stanza variations, performance notes if spoken word, historical/cultural context of chosen form, and reader interpretation guide.

prompts.title: Business Pivot Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a business turnaround consultant. Guide [COMPANY] through pivot from [CURRENT MODEL] to [NEW MODEL]. Include: market validation for new direction, financial impact assessment, customer migration strategy, product/service redesign requirements, operational changes needed, team skill gap analysis and training plan, messaging pivot for existing customers, brand repositioning strategy, risk mitigation for revenue disruption, milestone-based execution plan, and success metrics for pivot validation.

prompts.title: ML Model Development Pipeline
prompts.prompt: You are a machine learning engineer. Design ML solution for [PROBLEM] using [DATA]. Provide: problem formulation and success metrics, data exploration and quality assessment, feature engineering strategy, model selection rationale (trying 3+ algorithms), training pipeline with cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning approach, model evaluation with multiple metrics, bias and fairness analysis, model interpretability methods, deployment architecture, monitoring and retraining strategy, and documentation for stakeholders.

prompts.title: Contract Review Checklist
prompts.prompt: Act as a business attorney. Review [CONTRACT TYPE] for [PARTY]. Note: This is not legal advice. Analyze: key terms and obligations, payment and compensation clauses, termination conditions and notice periods, liability and indemnification provisions, intellectual property rights, confidentiality requirements, dispute resolution mechanisms, force majeure and change clauses, regulatory compliance considerations, red flags and unfavorable terms, negotiation points prioritized, and suggest protective language additions. Always consult licensed attorney.

prompts.title: Viral Growth Loop Designer
prompts.prompt: You are a growth hacker who has achieved viral coefficients >1. Design viral growth mechanism for [PRODUCT]. Include: viral loop identification in user journey, incentive structure for sharing (both sides of transaction), friction reduction in sharing process, social proof amplification tactics, referral tracking and attribution, A/B testing framework for optimization, network effects analysis, content virality factors, platform-specific distribution strategies, metrics dashboard (K-factor, viral coefficient, cycle time), and scaling plan.

prompts.title: Customer Success Story Builder
prompts.prompt: Act as a B2B content marketer. Write compelling case study for [CLIENT] using [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Structure: executive summary with key metrics, customer background and industry context, challenge section with quantified pain points, solution implementation details with timeline, results section with before/after metrics and ROI, direct quotes from stakeholders (3-5), visual data representation suggestions, competitive advantage demonstration, lessons learned, call-to-action for similar prospects, and SEO optimization for target keywords.

prompts.title: Cross-Platform App Architecture
prompts.prompt: You are a mobile architect. Design [APP] for iOS and Android using [FRAMEWORK]. Provide: architecture pattern justification (MVVM/Clean/etc), navigation structure and user flow, state management strategy, offline-first architecture with sync logic, API integration with caching, push notification implementation, deep linking structure, performance optimization techniques, security considerations (data storage/transmission), accessibility implementation, app store optimization strategy, and testing approach (unit/integration/E2E).

prompts.title: User Onboarding Flow Designer
prompts.prompt: Act as a customer success expert. Design onboarding for [PRODUCT] targeting [USER TYPE]. Include: user journey map from signup to activation, welcome experience with value reinforcement, progressive disclosure of features, interactive tutorials with completion tracking, quick win identification (aha moment), help documentation at point of need, email nurture sequence during first 30 days, engagement triggers and intervention points, success milestones with celebrations, feedback collection points, and churn prevention early warning system.

prompts.title: Investment Due Diligence Framework
prompts.prompt: You are an investment analyst. Evaluate [INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY] in [SECTOR]. Provide: executive summary with investment thesis, market analysis with TAM/SAM/SOM, competitive landscape mapping, business model assessment with revenue streams, financial metrics analysis (margins, growth, burn), management team evaluation, product/technology differentiation, customer acquisition and retention data, unit economics deep dive, risk assessment with scenario modeling, valuation analysis with comparable, exit strategy possibilities, and investment recommendation with rationale.

prompts.title: Newsworthy Press Release Formula
prompts.prompt: Act as a PR professional with media placement experience. Write press release for [ANNOUNCEMENT] targeting [MEDIA OUTLETS]. Include: compelling headline with news angle, dateline and lead paragraph answering 5Ws, news peg tying to current trends, company background boilerplate, executive quote providing perspective, supporting data and statistics, multimedia assets description, call-to-action for journalists, SEO optimization, distribution strategy, media list recommendations, and follow-up pitch email templates.

prompts.title: Complete Brand Identity System
prompts.prompt: You are a brand strategist and designer. Create brand identity for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Develop: brand positioning statement with differentiation, personality and archetype definition, visual identity guidelines (logo usage, color palette with psychology, typography system), voice and tone matrix for different contexts, brand messaging hierarchy, tagline options with rationale, application examples (business cards, website, social media), brand story narrative, competitor differentiation, internal brand guidelines document, and launch rollout plan.

prompts.title: Winning Business Proposal Template
prompts.prompt: Act as a proposal specialist with 70%+ win rate. Create proposal for [PROJECT/SERVICE] to [CLIENT]. Structure: executive summary customized to their needs, understanding of their problem/opportunity, proposed solution with clear methodology, scope of work with deliverables and timeline, team credentials and relevant case studies, pricing with value justification, implementation plan with milestones, success metrics and KPIs, risk mitigation strategies, terms and conditions, appendices with supporting documentation, and compelling closing with next steps.

prompts.title: RESTful API Design Best Practices
prompts.prompt: You are an API architect. Design RESTful API for [APPLICATION]. Provide: resource modeling with URI structure, HTTP methods usage for CRUD operations, request/response payload schemas (JSON), pagination and filtering strategy, versioning approach, authentication and authorization (OAuth2/JWT), rate limiting implementation, error handling with standard codes, HATEOAS links for discoverability, API documentation with examples, testing strategy, security best practices (CORS, input validation), and performance optimization (caching, compression).

prompts.title: High-Performance Team Building Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as an organizational psychologist and leadership coach. Design team optimization plan for [TEAM TYPE] of [SIZE]. Include: team assessment using Tuckman's stages, role clarity matrix with RACI, communication protocols and meeting cadence, psychological safety building exercises, conflict resolution framework, feedback culture implementation, goal alignment with OKRs, individual development plans, team building activities with purpose, performance metrics and review process, remote/hybrid work best practices, and leadership behavior modeling.

prompts.title: High-Converting Webinar Blueprint
prompts.prompt: You are a webinar marketing expert with 40%+ attendance rates. Plan webinar for [TOPIC] promoting [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: title and description that drive registrations, registration page copy with social proof, promotional campaign across channels, email reminder sequence, slide deck structure with engagement hooks, interactive elements (polls, Q&A, chat), pitch integration without being salesy, call-to-action strategy with urgency, follow-up sequence for attendees and no-shows, replay strategy, and conversion optimization tactics.

prompts.title: Authoritative White Paper Structure
prompts.prompt: Act as a B2B thought leadership writer. Create white paper on [TOPIC] for [INDUSTRY]. Include: executive summary with key findings, problem statement with market context, research methodology if applicable, in-depth analysis with data visualization, expert perspectives and quotes, solution framework or recommendations, implementation considerations, ROI analysis, future trends and predictions, conclusion with actionable takeaways, about company section, references and citations, and gated landing page copy for promotion.

prompts.title: CRO Audit and Action Plan
prompts.prompt: You are a conversion rate optimization specialist. Audit [E-COMMERCE SITE] for conversion improvements. Analyze: homepage effectiveness and value prop clarity, product page optimization (images, copy, CTAs), checkout flow friction points, mobile experience and responsiveness, page speed and Core Web Vitals, trust signals and social proof placement, urgency and scarcity tactics, abandoned cart recovery, upsell and cross-sell opportunities, A/B testing prioritization framework, analytics tracking gaps, and 90-day implementation roadmap with expected lift.

prompts.title: CI/CD Pipeline Architecture
prompts.prompt: Act as a DevOps engineer. Design CI/CD pipeline for [APPLICATION] using [TOOLS]. Include: source control branching strategy, automated build process, testing stages (unit/integration/E2E), code quality gates and coverage requirements, security scanning integration, artifact management, deployment environments (dev/staging/prod), deployment strategies (blue-green/canary/rolling), rollback procedures, monitoring and alerting, infrastructure as code approach, secrets management, and incident response runbook.

prompts.title: Comprehensive Budget Planning System
prompts.prompt: You are a certified financial planner. Create budget system for [INCOME LEVEL] with [FINANCIAL GOALS]. Include: income and expense categorization, 50/30/20 rule application, debt payoff strategy (avalanche vs snowball), emergency fund building plan, savings automation setup, expense tracking methodology, spending triggers identification, budget adjustment protocol, net worth tracking, financial milestone roadmap, investment allocation recommendations, and quarterly financial review process. Note: This is educational, not financial advice.

prompts.title: Affiliate Program Launch Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as an affiliate marketing manager. Launch affiliate program for [PRODUCT]. Design: commission structure with tiered incentives, affiliate recruitment strategy targeting ideal partners, application and vetting process, onboarding and training materials, promotional asset library (banners, copy, videos), tracking and attribution system, payment terms and schedule, affiliate communication cadence, performance leaderboard and contests, compliance and brand guideline enforcement, fraud prevention measures, and program optimization based on data.

prompts.title: Authentic Dialogue Crafting System
prompts.prompt: You are a dialogue coach for screenwriters. Write dialogue scene between [CHARACTERS] about [SITUATION]. Include: character voice differentiation through word choice and rhythm, subtext beneath surface conversation, conflict escalation or resolution, realistic interruptions and overlaps, dialect and speech patterns authentically, emotional beats and pauses, action lines between dialogue, exposition woven naturally, dialogue tags and attributions, multiple revision passes for authenticity, and performance notes for actors.

prompts.title: Strategic Partnership Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a business development executive. Develop partnership strategy for [COMPANY] targeting [PARTNERSHIP TYPE]. Include: partnership objectives and success metrics, ideal partner profile with criteria, value proposition for partners, partnership tier structure, outreach and pitch strategy, negotiation guidelines and deal terms, integration planning and resource requirements, joint go-to-market plan, revenue sharing model, performance tracking, relationship management process, conflict resolution protocols, and exit strategy considerations.

prompts.title: Executive Dashboard Design
prompts.prompt: You are a business intelligence analyst. Design executive dashboard for [BUSINESS FUNCTION]. Define: key performance indicators aligned to business objectives, metric definitions and calculation methods, data sources and integration points, visualization types for each metric (charts, gauges, tables), dashboard layout with information hierarchy, interactivity and drill-down capabilities, real-time vs. batch updates, mobile responsiveness, alert thresholds and notifications, comparison views (YoY, MoM, vs. target), and user access controls.

prompts.title: Engaging Newsletter Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a newsletter strategist with high engagement rates. Create newsletter strategy for [AUDIENCE] about [TOPIC]. Include: newsletter positioning and value proposition, content section structure, headline and subject line formulas, opening hook that drives read-through, content curation vs. original balance, personal voice and storytelling elements, visual design guidelines, CTA placement and variety, optimal send frequency and timing, subscriber segmentation strategy, welcome series for new subscribers, re-engagement campaign for inactive, and growth tactics.

prompts.title: Scalable Database Schema Design
prompts.prompt: You are a database architect. Design database schema for [APPLICATION] handling [DATA VOLUME]. Provide: entity-relationship diagram description, table structures with columns and data types, primary and foreign key relationships, indexing strategy for query optimization, normalization level with justification, denormalization considerations for performance, partitioning strategy for large tables, backup and recovery plan, data migration approach, query optimization examples, scaling strategy (vertical/horizontal), and security considerations (encryption, access control).

prompts.title: Structured Interview System
prompts.prompt: Act as a talent acquisition expert. Design interview process for [ROLE] at [COMPANY]. Include: competency framework mapped to job requirements, interview stage structure (phone screen/technical/cultural/final), standardized questions with scoring rubrics, take-home assignment or case study, evaluation criteria and decision matrix, interviewer training guidelines, candidate experience touchpoints, feedback collection process, bias mitigation strategies, reference check questions, offer negotiation framework, and rejection communication templates.

prompts.title: Online Community Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a community manager who has built 10K+ engaged communities. Create community strategy for [BRAND/PRODUCT]. Include: community vision and purpose, platform selection criteria and recommendation, content pillars and conversation starters, moderation guidelines and community rules, member onboarding and activation, engagement programs (challenges, AMAs, spotlights), community leadership identification and empowerment, metrics for community health, crisis management protocols, community-to-customer conversion paths, and scaling plan.

prompts.title: Privacy Policy and GDPR Compliance
prompts.prompt: Act as a privacy compliance consultant. Note: This is not legal advice. Create privacy framework for [WEBSITE/APP]. Address: data collection inventory and legal basis, privacy policy content requirements, cookie consent mechanism, user rights implementation (access, deletion, portability), data processing agreements with vendors, data breach notification procedures, privacy by design principles, international data transfer considerations, retention and deletion policies, consent management, and audit trail requirements. Always consult legal counsel.

prompts.title: Interactive Lesson Plan Designer
prompts.prompt: You are an experienced educator specializing in active learning. Create lesson plan for [SUBJECT/TOPIC] for [GRADE LEVEL] lasting [DURATION]. Include: learning objectives with measurable outcomes, prerequisite knowledge check, engagement hook opening, instruction sequence with scaffolding, active learning activities with grouping strategies, formative assessment checkpoints, differentiation for diverse learners, technology integration points, materials and resources needed, time allocation per section, reflection and closure activity, homework/extension opportunities, and assessment rubric.

prompts.title: Podcast Episode Script Formula
prompts.prompt: Act as a podcast producer with top-charting shows. Write script for [PODCAST NAME] episode on [TOPIC] for [DURATION]. Include: cold open with hook (30-60 seconds), intro music cue and host greeting, episode overview and value promise, main content segments with transitions, storytelling elements and anecdotes, guest interview questions with follow-ups if applicable, sponsor integration that feels natural, audience engagement prompts, call-to-action and next episode tease, outro with social media mentions, show notes outline, and SEO-optimized episode title and description.

prompts.title: Strategic Negotiation Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a master negotiator with enterprise deal experience. Prepare negotiation strategy for [DEAL TYPE] with [COUNTERPARTY]. Include: BATNA (Best Alternative) identification, reservation price calculation, target and aspiration goals, value creation opportunities beyond price, concession strategy with trade-offs, anchoring tactics, power dynamic analysis, cultural considerations, objection handling scripts, common tactics recognition and counters, communication style adaptation, closing techniques, relationship preservation approach, and post-negotiation implementation.

prompts.title: UX Wireframe and Flow Documentation
prompts.prompt: Act as a UX designer. Create wireframes for [FEATURE/PAGE] in [PRODUCT]. Provide: user flow diagram with decision points, low-fidelity wireframe descriptions for key screens, information architecture and content hierarchy, interaction patterns and micro-interactions, responsive design considerations for breakpoints, accessibility annotations, component library references, navigation structure, form design with validation states, empty states and error handling, loading states, success confirmation flows, and annotation document explaining design decisions.

prompts.title: Application Performance Tuning
prompts.prompt: You are a performance engineer. Optimize [APPLICATION] experiencing [PERFORMANCE ISSUE]. Analyze: performance profiling and bottleneck identification, database query optimization with explain plans, caching strategy implementation (Redis, CDN), code-level optimizations (algorithms, data structures), asset optimization (images, minification, lazy loading), API response time improvement, memory leak detection and fixes, concurrent request handling, scalability testing with load generation, monitoring and alerting setup, before/after benchmarks, and ongoing performance budget.

prompts.title: Product Launch Campaign Blueprint
prompts.prompt: Act as a product marketing manager with successful launches. Plan launch for [PRODUCT] targeting [MARKET]. Include: pre-launch hype building strategy, launch messaging framework, multi-channel campaign plan (email, social, PR, ads, content), influencer and press outreach, launch event or webinar design, early adopter program, limited-time offers and incentives, social proof collection strategy, customer onboarding enhancement, sales enablement materials, launch day timeline with responsibilities, success metrics and tracking, post-launch momentum tactics, and retrospective framework.

prompts.title: Self-Service Knowledge Base Structure
prompts.prompt: You are a customer experience architect. Design knowledge base for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Create: content taxonomy with categories and articles, search optimization strategy with keyword mapping, article template with consistent structure, writing style guide for clarity, multimedia integration (screenshots, videos, GIFs), progressive disclosure for complex topics, related articles suggestions, feedback mechanism for article usefulness, analytics tracking for popular searches and gaps, multilingual considerations, regular update process, and deflection rate measurement to reduce ticket volume.

prompts.title: Crisis Response and Communication Plan
prompts.prompt: Act as a crisis management consultant. Develop crisis response plan for [ORGANIZATION] facing [CRISIS TYPE]. Include: crisis assessment and severity classification, stakeholder identification and communication priorities, response team structure with roles, messaging framework with holding statements, communication channel strategy, timeline for response actions, internal communication plan, external PR and media strategy, social media monitoring and response, legal and compliance considerations, customer impact mitigation, reputation recovery tactics, post-crisis analysis, and prevention measures for future.

prompts.title: Fantasy/Sci-Fi World Construction
prompts.prompt: You are a world-building expert for speculative fiction. Create detailed world for [GENRE] story set in [TIME/PLACE]. Develop: geographical features and climate zones, political systems and power structures, economic system and trade, social hierarchy and cultural norms, religion or belief systems, magic or technology system with rules, history and major events shaping current state, languages and naming conventions, flora and fauna unique to world, daily life details, conflicts and tensions, how world impacts character choices, consistency bible for reference, and map description with key locations.

prompts.title: Rigorous A/B Test Design
prompts.prompt: Act as an experimentation scientist. Design A/B test for [HYPOTHESIS] on [PLATFORM]. Include: null and alternative hypothesis formulation, primary and secondary metrics definition, sample size calculation with power analysis, test duration recommendation, randomization strategy, variation design specifications, statistical significance threshold, guardrail metrics to prevent harm, segmentation analysis plan, data quality checks, analysis plan with visualization, result interpretation guidelines including statistical and practical significance, rollout plan for winning variant, and documentation template.

prompts.title: Video Marketing Campaign Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a video marketing strategist. Plan video campaign for [BRAND/PRODUCT] achieving [OBJECTIVE]. Include: video content strategy across funnel stages, video types and formats (explainer, testimonial, demo, behind-scenes), scriptwriting framework for each type, production specifications and budget allocation, platform optimization (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), thumbnail and title optimization, SEO strategy for video discovery, paid promotion strategy, video series planning for consistency, engagement tactics (CTAs, interactive elements), metrics and attribution tracking, repurposing strategy, and content calendar.

prompts.title: Modern Frontend Architecture
prompts.prompt: Act as a senior frontend engineer. Design frontend architecture for [APPLICATION] using [FRAMEWORK]. Include: component structure and hierarchy, state management pattern with data flow, routing and navigation strategy, styling approach (CSS-in-JS, modules, utility), form handling and validation, API integration with error handling, authentication flow, performance optimization (code splitting, lazy loading), accessibility implementation, responsive design system, testing strategy (unit, integration, visual regression), build and bundling configuration, and deployment pipeline.

prompts.title: E-commerce Email Automation
prompts.prompt: You are an e-commerce email strategist. Design email automation for [E-COMMERCE STORE]. Create: welcome series for new subscribers (3-5 emails), browse abandonment sequence, cart abandonment recovery (3 emails with escalating offers), post-purchase thank you and review request, replenishment reminders for consumables, win-back campaign for lapsed customers, VIP customer rewards program emails, personalization strategy using behavioral data, dynamic product recommendations, A/B testing plan, deliverability best practices, and revenue attribution model.

prompts.title: Organizational Change Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a change management expert. Guide [ORGANIZATION] through [CHANGE INITIATIVE]. Use: change readiness assessment, stakeholder analysis and coalition building, vision and case for change communication, resistance identification and mitigation strategies, change roadmap with phases, communication plan across all levels, training and capability building, quick wins identification, feedback loops and adjustment mechanisms, cultural alignment strategies, metrics for change adoption, sustainability planning, celebration of milestones, and post-implementation review.

prompts.title: Executive Thought Leadership Article
prompts.prompt: You are a ghostwriter for executives. Write thought leadership article for [EXECUTIVE] on [TOPIC] targeting [PUBLICATION]. Include: research on executive's previous statements and positions, compelling thesis that's contrarian or fresh, personal anecdote or experience as hook, industry trend analysis with data, actionable framework or methodology, case study or example, future predictions, call-to-action for readers, voice matching with executive's speaking style, SEO optimization for organic reach, social media promotion angles, and pitch email to target publications.

prompts.title: Lean Six Sigma Process Optimization
prompts.prompt: Act as a process improvement consultant. Optimize [PROCESS] in [DEPARTMENT]. Apply: current state mapping with detailed workflow, pain point and bottleneck identification, waste analysis (7 types of waste), root cause analysis using 5 Whys, future state design with improvements, standard operating procedure documentation, metrics definition (cycle time, defect rate, throughput), automation opportunities, training requirements, change management plan, pilot testing approach, continuous improvement mechanism, and ROI calculation.

prompts.title: Compelling Brand Story Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a brand storytelling expert. Craft brand story for [COMPANY]. Include: origin story with founder journey, problem discovery and mission definition, obstacles overcome and pivotal moments, values and beliefs that drive decisions, customer transformation stories, vision for future impact, emotional core that resonates, brand personality and voice, story arc with beginning/middle/end, multiple story lengths (6-word, elevator pitch, full narrative), internal storytelling for employees, external storytelling for marketing, and activation across touchpoints.

prompts.title: Microservices Architecture Design
prompts.prompt: Act as a microservices architect. Design microservices architecture for [SYSTEM] transitioning from [MONOLITH]. Provide: service decomposition strategy with bounded contexts, API gateway pattern, service discovery mechanism, inter-service communication (REST, gRPC, message queues), data management per service, distributed transaction handling, circuit breaker pattern for resilience, logging and distributed tracing, containerization with Docker, orchestration with Kubernetes, CI/CD per service, migration strategy with strangler pattern, and monitoring dashboard.

prompts.title: 5-Year Career Roadmap Builder
prompts.prompt: You are a career coach with executive placement experience. Create career plan for [CURRENT ROLE] aspiring to [TARGET ROLE]. Include: skills gap analysis with learning priorities, certification and education roadmap, experience-building opportunities (projects, stretch assignments), networking strategy with relationship mapping, personal brand development plan, resume and LinkedIn optimization, informational interview questions, mentor identification and approach, side projects for skill demonstration, industry trend awareness plan, job search strategy when ready, negotiation preparation, and quarterly progress review framework.

prompts.title: High-Converting Landing Page Copy
prompts.prompt: Act as a conversion copywriter. Write landing page for [OFFER] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Structure: headline with clear value prop, subheadline expanding on promise, hero image/video guidance, pain point agitation section, solution introduction with unique mechanism, benefit-driven feature list, social proof section (testimonials, logos, stats), risk reversal with guarantee, objection handling, pricing psychology, multiple CTA buttons strategically placed, FAQ section, exit-intent offer, and mobile optimization notes.

prompts.title: Strategic Pricing Model Design
prompts.prompt: You are a pricing strategist. Develop pricing strategy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] in [MARKET]. Include: cost-plus analysis with margin targets, value-based pricing with willingness to pay research, competitive pricing benchmark, psychological pricing tactics, price tiering with feature differentiation, freemium vs. paid structure, discount and promotion strategy, price testing framework, price communication and positioning, price elasticity estimation, anchoring techniques, bundling opportunities, contract terms (monthly/annual), and expansion revenue model.

prompts.title: Advanced Retargeting Campaign Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as a paid advertising specialist. Design retargeting campaign for [BUSINESS] across [PLATFORMS]. Include: audience segmentation by behavior (page visited, engagement level, cart abandoners), custom audience creation strategy, sequential messaging by funnel stage, creative variations addressing different objections, frequency capping to prevent ad fatigue, exclusion audiences for efficiency, cross-platform coordination, dynamic product ads setup, offer escalation strategy, attribution modeling, budget allocation by segment, and performance optimization framework.

prompts.title: Comprehensive Code Review Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a staff engineer conducting code reviews. Review [CODE] following best practices. Assess: functionality and requirement fulfillment, code organization and structure, naming conventions and readability, DRY principle adherence, error handling robustness, performance considerations, security vulnerabilities, test coverage adequacy, documentation completeness, accessibility compliance if UI, scalability considerations, tech debt introduction, backward compatibility, and provide constructive feedback with examples and priority levels (blocker/major/minor/nitpick).

prompts.title: Consultative Sales Discovery Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a sales consultant. Create discovery call framework for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] selling to [BUYER PERSONA]. Include: pre-call research checklist, opening rapport building, qualification questions (BANT/MEDDIC), pain point exploration with probing questions, current solution analysis, decision-making process understanding, stakeholder mapping, budget discussion approach, timeline identification, success criteria definition, objection handling responses, next steps proposal, note-taking template, and call follow-up email structure.

prompts.title: Scalable Design System Architecture
prompts.prompt: You are a design systems architect. Build design system for [PRODUCT/ORGANIZATION]. Create: design principles and philosophy, color system with semantic tokens, typography scale and hierarchy, spacing and layout grid, component library with variants and states, icon set with usage guidelines, illustration style guide, animation and motion principles, accessibility standards, responsive breakpoints, design tokens structure, documentation site outline, Figma/Sketch organization, code component mapping, contribution guidelines, and versioning strategy.

prompts.title: Data Visualization Infographic Blueprint
prompts.prompt: Act as an information designer. Design infographic about [TOPIC/DATA] for [AUDIENCE]. Include: compelling headline with key insight, data narrative flow from problem to solution, visual hierarchy with focal points, data visualization types (charts, icons, illustrations), color scheme with meaning, whitespace and readability, statistic callouts with sources, supporting text that enhances not repeats visuals, actionable takeaways, branding integration, share-worthy size and format, accessibility considerations, and distribution strategy across channels.

prompts.title: Comprehensive Market Research Study
prompts.prompt: You are a market research analyst. Conduct market research for [PRODUCT/MARKET]. Include: research objectives and hypotheses, methodology selection (quantitative/qualitative/mixed), target audience definition and sampling strategy, survey design with unbiased questions, interview guide for depth interviews, secondary research sources, competitive landscape analysis, market sizing (TAM/SAM/SOM), customer segmentation analysis, trend identification, PESTEL analysis, findings synthesis with insights, data visualization recommendations, and strategic recommendations with evidence.

prompts.title: Developer Documentation Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a technical documentation specialist. Create documentation for [CODEBASE/PROJECT]. Include: README with project overview and quick start, architecture documentation with diagrams, setup and installation instructions for all environments, configuration guide with environment variables, API reference if applicable, code examples and tutorials, contributing guidelines for open source, testing instructions, deployment guide, troubleshooting common issues, changelog format, style guide for code contributions, onboarding guide for new developers, and documentation maintenance process.

prompts.title: Proactive Churn Reduction Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a customer success strategist. Build churn prevention system for [SaaS PRODUCT]. Include: churn risk scoring model with leading indicators, early warning dashboard, customer health score components, engagement monitoring and alerts, proactive outreach triggers, win-back campaign for at-risk customers, customer feedback loops, success plan templates by segment, value realization tracking, executive business reviews structure, product adoption strategies, community building for retention, and renewal playbook with pricing discussions.

prompts.title: Viral Referral Program Design
prompts.prompt: Act as a growth marketer. Design referral program for [PRODUCT] achieving viral growth. Include: incentive structure (double-sided rewards), reward tiers for top referrers, referral mechanics and user flow, sharing channel optimization (email, social, SMS), tracking and attribution system, fraud prevention measures, referral link and code generation, referral dashboard for users, promotional campaign for launch, email templates for referral requests, gamification elements, leaderboard and competitions, success metrics (viral coefficient, referral rate), and optimization testing plan.

prompts.title: Authentic Memoir Structure Builder
prompts.prompt: You are a memoir writing coach. Guide writing of memoir about [LIFE EXPERIENCE/THEME]. Include: central theme or question exploration, pivotal moments selection, chronological vs. thematic structure, scene-setting with sensory details, character portrayal of real people, dialogue reconstruction techniques, reflection and meaning-making, vulnerability and honesty balance, pacing with tension and release, voice authenticity and consistency, beginning that hooks readers, ending with transformation or insight, fact-checking considerations, privacy and consent, and revision checklist for strengthening narrative.

prompts.title: Predictive Model Development Guide
prompts.prompt: Act as a data scientist. Build predictive model for [BUSINESS PROBLEM] using [DATA]. Process: business problem framing with success criteria, data collection and quality assessment, exploratory data analysis with insights, feature engineering and selection, train/test/validation split strategy, model selection (regression, classification, time series), baseline model establishment, algorithm comparison with metrics, cross-validation approach, hyperparameter tuning, model interpretation and explainability, bias and fairness audit, deployment strategy, monitoring and retraining triggers, and stakeholder communication plan.

prompts.title: Exceptional Employee Onboarding Program
prompts.prompt: You are an HR specialist focused on employee experience. Design onboarding program for [ROLE/DEPARTMENT]. Include: pre-boarding communication and preparation, first day agenda with warm welcome, week one orientation schedule, 30-60-90 day plan with milestones, role-specific training curriculum, company culture immersion, buddy/mentor assignment, check-in cadence with manager, administrative setup checklist, tools and access provisioning, social integration activities, feedback collection at intervals, success metrics for onboarding effectiveness, and continuous improvement process.

prompts.title: LinkedIn Thought Leadership Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as a LinkedIn content strategist. Create LinkedIn strategy for [PROFESSIONAL] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: profile optimization with keyword strategy, content pillars aligned to expertise, post formats variety (text, carousel, video, poll), engagement-driving post structures, storytelling frameworks for personal brand, comment strategy for visibility, connection outreach templates, article topics for long-form, hashtag research and strategy, posting schedule optimization, engagement pod considerations, DM conversation starters, metrics tracking, and thought leadership positioning plan.

prompts.title: Supply Chain Optimization Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a supply chain consultant. Optimize supply chain for [BUSINESS/PRODUCT]. Analyze: current state mapping of entire chain, inventory management optimization (safety stock, reorder points), supplier evaluation and relationship management, demand forecasting methodology, logistics and transportation optimization, warehouse layout and operations, procurement strategy, quality control processes, risk assessment and mitigation (single source, geopolitical), technology integration opportunities, sustainability considerations, cost reduction initiatives, and KPI dashboard for supply chain health.

prompts.title: GraphQL API Design and Implementation
prompts.prompt: Act as a GraphQL expert. Design GraphQL API for [APPLICATION]. Include: schema design with types and relationships, query and mutation design, subscription implementation for real-time, resolver structure and optimization, N+1 query problem mitigation with DataLoader, authentication and authorization at field level, error handling strategy, pagination approaches (cursor vs offset), caching strategy, rate limiting, API versioning strategy, introspection and documentation, testing approach, and performance monitoring setup.

prompts.title: ABM Campaign Strategy and Execution
prompts.prompt: You are an ABM specialist. Design ABM strategy for [COMPANY] targeting [ACCOUNT LIST]. Include: ideal customer profile refinement, target account selection and tiering, buying committee mapping, account research and insights gathering, personalized content strategy per account, multi-channel orchestration (email, LinkedIn, direct mail, events), account-specific landing pages, sales and marketing alignment process, account engagement scoring, technology stack requirements (CRM, automation, analytics), measurement framework with account-level metrics, and playbook for scaling ABM program.

prompts.title: Compelling Presentation Design Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a public speaking coach. Create presentation for [TOPIC] to [AUDIENCE] for [DURATION]. Include: opening hook with attention grabber, clear thesis and preview, story arc structure, main points with supporting evidence, data visualization for clarity, stories and examples for connection, transition phrases for flow, interactive elements for engagement, handling Q&A strategically, closing with memorable call-to-action, slide design principles (minimal text, strong visuals), delivery notes (pacing, pauses, emphasis), rehearsal strategy, and nervousness management techniques.

prompts.title: Multi-Channel Marketplace Expansion
prompts.prompt: You are an e-commerce marketplace strategist. Plan expansion to [MARKETPLACES] for [PRODUCT CATEGORY]. Include: marketplace selection criteria and prioritization, account setup and optimization, product listing optimization (title, bullets, description, images), pricing strategy across channels, inventory allocation and fulfillment, advertising strategy per marketplace, review generation tactics, compliance with marketplace policies, competitor monitoring, brand protection measures, performance metrics by channel, customer service integration, and profitability analysis per marketplace.

prompts.title: Business Exit Planning Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as an M&A advisor. Plan exit strategy for [BUSINESS] targeting [EXIT TYPE]. Include: business valuation with multiple methodologies, value driver identification and enhancement, financial preparation and clean-up, operational excellence documentation, buyer profile and targeting, due diligence preparation checklist, deal structure options (asset vs stock, earnouts), negotiation strategy and tactics, tax optimization considerations, transition planning, key employee retention, customer and supplier communication, legal and regulatory requirements, and post-exit personal planning.

prompts.title: Grant Proposal Writing Template
prompts.prompt: You are a grant writing specialist with high success rates. Write grant proposal for [ORGANIZATION] seeking [AMOUNT] for [PROJECT]. Include: executive summary with compelling ask, organizational background and credibility, problem statement with supporting data, project description with methodology, goals and measurable objectives, timeline with milestones, budget narrative with justification, sustainability plan beyond grant period, evaluation plan with metrics, organizational capacity demonstration, letters of support strategy, appendices list, funder alignment analysis, and compliance with specific guidelines.

prompts.title: Smart Contract Development Guide
prompts.prompt: Act as a blockchain developer. Create smart contract for [USE CASE] on [BLOCKCHAIN]. Provide: contract architecture and design patterns, Solidity/other language best practices, function design with access control, event emission for transparency, gas optimization techniques, security audit checklist (reentrancy, overflow, etc.), test suite with edge cases, deployment script and verification, upgrade strategy (proxy patterns), integration with frontend, documentation for users and developers, and compliance considerations for jurisdiction.

prompts.title: Podcast Launch and Growth Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a podcast marketing expert. Launch and grow podcast for [NICHE/AUDIENCE]. Include: show concept and unique positioning, episode format and structure, guest booking strategy with outreach templates, recording and editing workflow, RSS feed setup and hosting platform, cover art and branding guidelines, show notes optimization for SEO, launch strategy with review generation, distribution across directories, social media promotion tactics, audiogram creation for clips, email list building, sponsorship pitch deck, cross-promotion partnerships, analytics and growth metrics, and monetization strategy.

prompts.title: Comprehensive Sales Enablement Program
prompts.prompt: Act as a sales enablement leader. Build enablement program for [SALES TEAM] selling [PRODUCT]. Include: sales process documentation and playbooks, onboarding curriculum for new reps, product training with certification, competitive battle cards, objection handling library, value proposition messaging framework, sales collateral audit and creation, demo environment and scripts, CRM training and adoption, coaching framework for managers, performance metrics dashboard, content management system, sales and marketing alignment, continuous learning programs, and technology stack recommendations.

prompts.title: Motion Design and Animation Principles
prompts.prompt: You are a motion designer. Create animation guidelines for [PRODUCT/BRAND]. Include: motion design principles and philosophy, timing and easing curves library, transition types and usage, loading state animations, micro-interactions for delight, onboarding animation sequence, success/error state animations, skeleton screens vs spinners, parallax scrolling effects, gesture-based animations, accessibility considerations (respect reduced motion), performance optimization techniques, animation documentation for developers, prototyping approach, and brand personality expression through motion.

prompts.title: Impactful Speech Writing Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a speechwriter for leaders. Write speech for [SPEAKER] at [EVENT] about [TOPIC] lasting [DURATION]. Include: audience analysis and adaptation, opening with impact (question, story, statistic, quote), thesis statement, 3-5 main points with transitions, rhetorical devices (repetition, rule of three, metaphor), personal stories for connection, data for credibility, emotional appeals balanced with logic, addressing counterarguments, call-to-action that inspires, memorable closing, delivery notes for pauses and emphasis, and variations for different time limits.

prompts.title: Customer Cohort Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt: You are a data analyst specializing in behavioral analysis. Conduct cohort analysis for [BUSINESS] measuring [BEHAVIOR]. Include: cohort definition (acquisition date, signup source, user segment), metric selection (retention, revenue, engagement), time period granularity, cohort size and statistical significance, visualization design (heatmap, line chart), trend identification across cohorts, seasonal pattern detection, hypothesis generation for differences, actionable insights extraction, A/B testing recommendations, segmentation for deeper analysis, and dashboard design for ongoing monitoring.

prompts.title: Franchise Business Model Design
prompts.prompt: Act as a franchise consultant. Develop franchise model for [BUSINESS]. Include: franchisability assessment, franchise structure (single-unit vs multi-unit vs area development), franchise fee and royalty structure, initial investment breakdown, site selection criteria, training program design (initial and ongoing), operations manual table of contents, brand standards and compliance, marketing fund structure, franchisee support system, technology and systems for franchisees, legal documents needed (FDD, franchise agreement), franchise sales process, and growth projections.

prompts.title: Serverless Architecture Design
prompts.prompt: You are a cloud architect specializing in serverless. Design serverless application for [USE CASE] on [CLOUD PROVIDER]. Include: function design and granularity, event-driven architecture patterns, API Gateway configuration, authentication and authorization, database selection for serverless (DynamoDB, Aurora Serverless), state management strategies, cold start optimization, cost optimization techniques, logging and monitoring setup, CI/CD pipeline for functions, testing strategy for serverless, security best practices, scalability considerations, and migration path from traditional architecture.

prompts.title: Customer Complaint Management System
prompts.prompt: Act as a customer experience expert. Design complaint resolution system for [COMPANY]. Include: complaint intake channels and centralization, severity classification and routing, response time SLAs by severity, resolution process flowchart, empathy-driven response templates, escalation triggers and paths, root cause analysis methodology, compensation/remedy guidelines, closed-loop feedback system, trend analysis and reporting, proactive issue prevention, staff training on de-escalation, customer sentiment tracking, recovery paradox leverage, and continuous improvement process.

prompts.title: Virtual and In-Person Event Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are an event marketing strategist. Plan [EVENT TYPE] for [COMPANY] targeting [AUDIENCE SIZE]. Include: event concept and theme, goals and success metrics, budget breakdown by category, venue selection criteria (or virtual platform), agenda design with speaker lineup, registration landing page optimization, promotional campaign timeline, partnership and sponsorship opportunities, attendee engagement tactics, networking facilitation, content capture and repurposing plan, post-event follow-up sequence, ROI measurement framework, and hybrid event considerations.

prompts.title: Developmental and Copy Editing Process
prompts.prompt: Act as a professional editor. Edit [CONTENT TYPE] on [TOPIC] with [WORD COUNT]. Provide: developmental edit for structure and flow, content organization and logical progression, clarity and conciseness improvements, voice and tone consistency, grammar and punctuation corrections, sentence variety and rhythm, redundancy elimination, fact-checking flags, style guide compliance, readability score improvement, SEO optimization if applicable, proofreading pass, track changes with comments explaining edits, style sheet for consistency, and final quality assurance checklist.

prompts.title: Startup Fundraising Strategy and Pitch
prompts.prompt: You are a startup fundraising advisor. Prepare for [FUNDING ROUND] raising [AMOUNT] for [STARTUP]. Include: fundraising strategy and timeline, investor targeting and segmentation, pitch deck structure (10-15 slides), compelling narrative and storytelling, traction and metrics that matter, market sizing and opportunity, competitive landscape positioning, business model clarity, financial projections with assumptions, team slide highlighting strengths, ask and use of funds breakdown, data room preparation checklist, due diligence readiness, objection handling, term sheet negotiation points, and outreach strategy.

prompts.title: Game Design and Development Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a game developer and designer. Design [GAME GENRE] for [PLATFORM]. Include: game concept and unique selling point, core gameplay loop, mechanics and systems design, level design principles and progression, player progression and rewards, monetization strategy if applicable, technical architecture and engine selection, art style and visual direction, sound design guidelines, UI/UX for game interface, playtesting framework and iteration, performance optimization for target platform, analytics integration for engagement, accessibility features, and post-launch content roadmap.

prompts.title: Modern Performance Management System
prompts.prompt: You are an HR strategist. Design performance management system for [ORGANIZATION SIZE] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: performance philosophy and principles, goal-setting framework (OKRs/KPIs/SMART), continuous feedback culture building, check-in cadence (weekly/monthly/quarterly), 360-degree feedback implementation, performance rating scale and calibration, development planning integration, compensation linkage approach, underperformance management protocol, high performer retention strategies, manager training curriculum, performance review template, system technology requirements, and cultural change management plan.

prompts.title: Voice Search Optimization Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as an SEO specialist focused on voice search. Optimize for voice search for [WEBSITE] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: conversational keyword research, question-based content strategy, featured snippet optimization, local SEO for 'near me' queries, structured data implementation, page speed optimization for mobile, natural language content creation, FAQ page development, long-tail keyword targeting, Google My Business optimization, voice search analytics setup, content formatting for voice results, and mobile-first indexing compliance.

prompts.title: Quality Management System Design
prompts.prompt: You are a quality assurance expert. Implement QMS for [ORGANIZATION] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: quality policy and objectives, process mapping and documentation, standard operating procedures, quality control checkpoints, inspection and testing protocols, non-conformance handling process, corrective and preventive action system, supplier quality management, training and competency requirements, document control system, internal audit program, management review process, continuous improvement methodology, quality metrics dashboard, and certification preparation (ISO 9001 if applicable).

prompts.title: Customer Testimonial Collection System
prompts.prompt: Act as a customer marketing specialist. Build testimonial collection strategy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: timing for testimonial requests, multi-channel request approach, interview question guide for depth, video testimonial production guidelines, written testimonial template with prompts, specific outcome and metric extraction, before-and-after story structure, permission and release forms, testimonial organization and tagging, display strategy across marketing channels, testimonial landing page design, authenticity and credibility signals, ongoing collection automation, and usage rights management.

prompts.title: NLP Application Development Guide
prompts.prompt: You are an NLP engineer. Build NLP solution for [USE CASE] processing [TEXT TYPE]. Include: problem definition and success metrics, data collection and annotation strategy, text preprocessing pipeline, feature extraction approach (TF-IDF, embeddings, transformers), model selection (classification, NER, sentiment, summarization), training data requirements and augmentation, model training and validation, evaluation metrics appropriate for task, error analysis and improvement, bias detection and mitigation, deployment architecture, API design for inference, monitoring for model drift, and continuous learning strategy.

prompts.title: Digital Transformation Roadmap
prompts.prompt: Act as a digital transformation consultant. Guide [ORGANIZATION] through digital transformation in [INDUSTRY]. Include: current state digital maturity assessment, vision and transformation objectives, technology stack evaluation and modernization, process digitization priorities, data strategy and analytics capability, customer experience digital enhancement, employee digital literacy program, change management strategy, cybersecurity and risk management, vendor selection criteria, phased implementation roadmap, quick wins identification, budget and resource allocation, ROI measurement framework, and governance structure.

prompts.title: PWA Development Best Practices
prompts.prompt: You are a PWA specialist. Build progressive web app for [APPLICATION]. Include: service worker implementation for offline functionality, caching strategy (cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate), app shell architecture, manifest.json configuration, push notification implementation, add-to-homescreen prompt, offline page design, background sync for data, performance optimization for mobile, responsive design principles, app-like navigation patterns, install prompt strategy, testing across devices and browsers, lighthouse audit optimization, and deployment considerations.

prompts.title: Online Reputation Management Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as a reputation management expert. Protect and enhance reputation for [BRAND/INDIVIDUAL]. Include: reputation audit across platforms, review monitoring system setup, review response protocol and templates, negative review mitigation tactics, positive review generation strategy, social media listening and response, crisis communication plan, content creation for reputation building, SEO for positive content amplification, Google My Business optimization, third-party review site management, employee advocacy program, influencer relationships, legal considerations, and ongoing reputation tracking dashboard.

prompts.title: Revenue Forecasting Model
prompts.prompt: You are a sales operations analyst. Build forecasting model for [SALES TEAM] selling [PRODUCT]. Include: historical data analysis and patterns, forecasting methodology selection (pipeline, trend-based, opportunity), pipeline stage conversion rates, velocity metrics by stage, win rate analysis by segment, seasonality adjustment factors, forecasting at rep and team levels, confidence intervals and scenario planning, CRM data quality requirements, forecast accuracy measurement, variance analysis process, forecast submission and review cadence, territory and quota planning integration, and predictive analytics enhancement.

prompts.title: Icon System Design Guidelines
prompts.prompt: Act as an icon designer. Create icon system for [PRODUCT/BRAND]. Include: icon style and visual language, grid system and sizing specifications, line weight and corner radius standards, color usage guidelines, metaphor selection principles, cultural considerations and localization, icon categories and organization, filled vs outlined variations, state variations (active, inactive, disabled), accessibility requirements (size, contrast), file format and export specifications, naming conventions, icon documentation and usage examples, and scalability across sizes.

prompts.title: User-Generated Content Campaign
prompts.prompt: You are a UGC marketing strategist. Launch UGC campaign for [BRAND] on [PLATFORM]. Include: campaign concept and hashtag strategy, participation incentives and rewards, content guidelines and submission process, rights and permissions acquisition, moderation and curation process, featuring strategy for top content, influencer seeding for momentum, cross-platform amplification, community engagement tactics, legal considerations and disclaimers, content organization and storage, repurposing strategy for marketing, success metrics (participation, reach, conversion), and ongoing UGC program development.

prompts.title: Dynamic Financial Model Builder
prompts.prompt: Act as a financial modeler. Build financial model for [BUSINESS] for [PURPOSE]. Include: assumptions sheet with drivers, historical financials integration, three-statement model (P&L, balance sheet, cash flow), revenue build with unit economics, cost structure modeling, working capital calculations, capital expenditure planning, debt schedule with amortization, equity waterfall if applicable, scenario analysis (base, upside, downside), sensitivity analysis for key variables, valuation output (DCF, comparable), executive summary dashboard, error checks and balancing, and documentation of formulas.

prompts.title: Web Accessibility Compliance Guide
prompts.prompt: You are an accessibility expert. Make [WEBSITE/APP] WCAG 2.1 compliant at [LEVEL]. Include: accessibility audit with violations, semantic HTML implementation, keyboard navigation support, screen reader optimization, color contrast compliance, alternative text for images, ARIA labels and roles, focus management, form accessibility, responsive text sizing, captions and transcripts for media, error identification and suggestions, skip navigation links, accessible data tables, testing with assistive technologies, documentation for developers, and ongoing compliance monitoring.

prompts.title: Leadership Succession Planning Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as an organizational development consultant. Create succession plan for [ORGANIZATION] focusing on [ROLES]. Include: critical position identification and risk assessment, competency modeling for key roles, talent review and 9-box assessment, high-potential identification criteria, individual development plans for successors, knowledge transfer protocols, emergency succession procedures, retention strategies for key talent, external vs internal candidate balance, diversity in succession pipeline, leadership development programs, mentoring and coaching structure, succession readiness dashboard, and regular review process.

prompts.title: Marketing Chatbot Strategy and Flow
prompts.prompt: You are a conversational marketing expert. Design marketing chatbot for [WEBSITE] achieving [GOAL]. Include: chatbot personality and tone, conversation flows for different user intents, qualification questions for lead generation, product recommendation logic, FAQ automation, proactive engagement triggers, human handoff criteria, integration with CRM and marketing automation, multi-language support if needed, analytics and optimization tracking, A/B testing framework for messages, GDPR compliance for data collection, chatbot promotion strategy, and continuous improvement based on data.

prompts.title: Evergreen Content Strategy Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a content strategist focused on long-term value. Create evergreen content strategy for [WEBSITE/BLOG]. Include: evergreen topic identification in niche, keyword research for sustainable traffic, comprehensive content structure (pillar pages, cluster content), depth and quality standards, internal linking strategy, content refresh and update schedule, visual assets for longevity, SEO optimization for featured snippets, promotion strategy for initial traction, repurposing opportunities, conversion path integration, analytics tracking for long-term performance, and content pruning criteria.
