prompts.title: Innovation and R&D Framework
prompts.prompt: You are an innovation strategist. Develop innovation program for [ORGANIZATION] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: innovation vision and objectives, innovation portfolio balance (core/adjacent/transformational), ideation process and tools, innovation pipeline management, stage-gate decision criteria, resource allocation model, cross-functional collaboration structure, external innovation sources (open innovation, partnerships), experimentation and failure culture, intellectual property strategy, metrics for innovation success, innovation lab or incubator setup, customer co-creation process, and innovation governance.

prompts.title: Real-Time Application Architecture
prompts.prompt: Act as a real-time systems architect. Design real-time application for [USE CASE] handling [CONCURRENCY LEVEL]. Include: WebSocket or Server-Sent Events selection, connection management and scaling, message queuing and delivery guarantees, state synchronization across clients, conflict resolution strategies, presence and activity tracking, real-time database considerations, load balancing for WebSockets, reconnection and recovery logic, security and authentication for real-time connections, rate limiting and abuse prevention, monitoring real-time performance, fallback mechanisms, and testing real-time features.

prompts.title: Customer Education Program Design
prompts.prompt: You are a customer education specialist. Build education program for [PRODUCT] users. Include: learning path design by user role and maturity, certification program structure, course curriculum development, content formats (video, interactive, documentation), learning management system selection, assessment and knowledge checks, hands-on labs and exercises, instructor-led training schedule, self-paced learning options, community learning features, content maintenance process, success metrics (completion, proficiency, product adoption), feedback collection, and education marketing strategy.

prompts.title: Programmatic Ad Campaign Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as a programmatic advertising expert. Design programmatic strategy for [BRAND] with [BUDGET]. Include: campaign objectives and KPIs, audience targeting strategy (contextual, behavioral, demographic), data management platform setup, demand-side platform selection, supply-side partnerships, creative specifications and variations, bidding strategy and optimization, brand safety measures, viewability standards, fraud prevention tactics, attribution modeling, cross-device targeting, privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA), reporting and analytics dashboard, and optimization playbook.

prompts.title: Comedy and Humor Writing Techniques
prompts.prompt: You are a comedy writer. Create humorous content for [MEDIUM] about [TOPIC] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Include: comedy structure (setup and punchline), surprise and misdirection techniques, rule of three application, exaggeration and hyperbole, observational humor angles, wordplay and puns if appropriate, callback techniques, timing and rhythm in text, reading audience and tone calibration, offensive vs edgy balance, self-deprecation when appropriate, satire and parody elements, visual comedy suggestions, and testing humor effectiveness.

prompts.title: Inventory Optimization System
prompts.prompt: Act as an inventory management consultant. Optimize inventory for [BUSINESS] carrying [PRODUCT TYPES]. Include: ABC analysis for prioritization, safety stock calculation, reorder point determination, economic order quantity optimization, demand forecasting methodology, lead time analysis and variability, inventory turnover improvement, dead stock identification and clearance, just-in-time considerations, warehouse organization and slotting, cycle counting program, inventory tracking technology (RFID, barcode), seasonal inventory planning, supplier collaboration for VMI, and inventory KPI dashboard.

prompts.title: Advanced Customer Segmentation Model
prompts.prompt: You are a data analyst specializing in segmentation. Create customer segmentation for [BUSINESS] using [DATA SOURCES]. Include: segmentation variables selection (demographic, behavioral, psychographic, firmographic), data preparation and feature engineering, clustering methodology (K-means, hierarchical, RFM), optimal number of segments determination, segment profiling and personas, segment size and value analysis, segment naming and positioning, targeting strategy per segment, personalization opportunities, segment migration tracking, predictive segment assignment, activation across channels, and segment performance monitoring.

prompts.title: Chrome Extension Development Guide
prompts.prompt: Act as a Chrome extension developer. Build extension for [FUNCTIONALITY]. Include: manifest.json configuration, permissions selection and justification, background script vs content script architecture, browser action or page action design, popup HTML and interaction, options page for settings, storage API usage, message passing between scripts, content security policy compliance, Chrome APIs utilization, cross-browser compatibility considerations, debugging techniques, privacy policy for Chrome Web Store, listing optimization, user onboarding flow, and update strategy.

prompts.title: Customer Advocacy Program Development
prompts.prompt: You are a customer marketing leader. Build advocacy program for [COMPANY]. Include: advocate identification and segmentation, program benefits and rewards structure, advocacy activities (reviews, referrals, case studies, speaking, social sharing), tiered membership levels, community platform for advocates, exclusive access and recognition, advocacy content creation opportunities, measurement of advocacy impact, advocate communication strategy, onboarding for new advocates, advocacy event programming, swag and merchandise, NPS promoter conversion, and scaling the program.

prompts.title: Corporate Sustainability Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a sustainability consultant. Develop sustainability strategy for [ORGANIZATION] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: materiality assessment of ESG issues, baseline carbon footprint calculation, science-based targets setting, circular economy opportunities, sustainable supply chain initiatives, energy efficiency and renewable energy plan, waste reduction and recycling programs, water stewardship, social impact and community engagement, diversity and inclusion goals, governance and ethics, sustainability reporting framework (GRI, SASB), stakeholder engagement, employee sustainability culture, and impact measurement.

prompts.title: Quora Content Marketing Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a Quora marketing specialist. Build presence on Quora for [BRAND/EXPERTISE]. Include: topic selection and following strategy, question identification with high visibility potential, answer structure for engagement (hook, value, subtle promotion), expertise demonstration and credibility building, linking strategy without being spammy, personal brand vs company brand balance, frequency and consistency plan, upvote optimization tactics, profile optimization with bio and credentials, Quora Spaces strategy, monitoring brand mentions, analytics tracking, repurposing answers to blog content, and lead generation approach.

prompts.title: Strategic Account Planning Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as an enterprise account executive. Create account plan for [CLIENT] worth [REVENUE TARGET]. Include: account overview and business understanding, organizational chart and stakeholder map, relationship strength assessment, opportunity identification and prioritization, competitive landscape within account, value proposition customization, account strategy and objectives, multi-threading approach across org, executive alignment strategy, account team and resources, risk assessment and mitigation, quarterly business review planning, expansion roadmap, success metrics, and renewal strategy.

prompts.title: Typography System Design Guide
prompts.prompt: You are a typography designer. Create typography system for [BRAND/PRODUCT]. Include: typeface selection rationale (legibility, personality, technical requirements), hierarchy levels and scale (H1-H6, body, caption), font pairing principles, line height and letter spacing specifications, responsive typography approach, font loading strategy and performance, web font licensing, accessibility considerations (minimum sizes, contrast), typographic color usage, modular scale implementation, font weight usage guidelines, special treatments (uppercase, italics), multilingual typography support, and documentation for designers and developers.

prompts.title: WebAssembly Integration Guide
prompts.prompt: Act as a WebAssembly expert. Integrate WebAssembly into [APPLICATION] for [PERFORMANCE GOAL]. Include: use case identification for Wasm (compute-intensive, existing C/C++/Rust code), compilation from source language, JavaScript interop and glue code, memory management between JS and Wasm, module instantiation and loading, debugging Wasm code, performance profiling and optimization, browser compatibility handling, fallback strategies, bundling and deployment, security considerations, threading with SharedArrayBuffer, SIMD usage, and future Wasm features roadmap.

prompts.title: Global Customer Support Strategy
prompts.prompt: You are a global customer experience leader. Build multilingual support for [MARKETS/LANGUAGES]. Include: language prioritization based on customer base, hiring strategy for native speakers, translation and localization process, knowledge base multilingual content, multilingual chatbot implementation, language routing logic, cultural sensitivity training, timezone coverage planning, quality assurance across languages, CRM multilingual capabilities, performance metrics by language, escalation paths, cost optimization strategies, machine translation evaluation, and continuous improvement feedback loops.

prompts.title: Creative Guerrilla Marketing Campaign
prompts.prompt: Act as a guerrilla marketing creative. Design unconventional campaign for [BRAND] with [LIMITED BUDGET]. Include: attention-grabbing concept that surprises, low-cost high-impact tactics, viral potential and shareability, location-based experiences, flash mob or street art considerations, PR and media coverage angles, social media amplification strategy, legal and permit considerations, safety and ethical boundaries, documentation and content capture, measurement of buzz and impressions, risk assessment, timing for maximum impact, and integration with broader marketing.

prompts.title: M&A Due Diligence Framework
prompts.prompt: You are an M&A advisor. Conduct due diligence for [ACQUISITION TARGET] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: financial due diligence (historical performance, quality of earnings), legal due diligence (contracts, litigation, compliance), commercial due diligence (market position, customer concentration), operational due diligence (processes, systems, capacity), technology and IP assessment, human resources and culture fit, environmental and regulatory issues, synergy identification and validation, risk assessment and deal breakers, valuation impact of findings, integration planning considerations, and due diligence report structure.

prompts.title: Reddit Community Engagement Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as a Reddit marketing expert. Build authentic presence on Reddit for [BRAND] in [SUBREDDITS]. Include: subreddit research and selection, community rules understanding, value-first content strategy, AMA (Ask Me Anything) planning, comment engagement and relationship building, subtle promotion guidelines (90-10 rule), karma building strategy, Reddit advertising complement, crisis and negative comment handling, moderator relationship building, content timing optimization, analytics and monitoring tools, authenticity and transparency principles, and long-term community contribution plan.

prompts.title: Edge Computing Architecture Design
prompts.prompt: You are an edge computing architect. Design edge solution for [USE CASE] with [LATENCY REQUIREMENTS]. Include: edge vs cloud decision framework, edge location selection strategy, edge computing platform selection (AWS Greengrass, Azure IoT Edge), application partitioning between edge and cloud, data synchronization and consistency, offline operation capabilities, edge security and device management, bandwidth optimization techniques, edge analytics and ML inference, monitoring and diagnostics at edge, OTA updates and deployment, scalability across edge locations, and cost optimization strategy.

prompts.title: Remote Team Leadership Framework
prompts.prompt: Act as a remote work expert and leadership coach. Build remote team culture for [TEAM TYPE]. Include: communication norms and tools, meeting cadence and best practices (all-hands, 1:1s, team sync), asynchronous work principles, documentation culture, trust building in virtual environment, remote onboarding process, performance management for remote, timezone management strategies, virtual team building activities, mental health and work-life balance support, home office setup guidance, collaboration tool stack, inclusive meeting practices, career development remotely, and hybrid work considerations.

prompts.title: Systematic CRO Testing Program
prompts.prompt: You are a CRO specialist. Build testing program for [WEBSITE] optimizing for [CONVERSION GOAL]. Include: conversion funnel analysis and leak identification, research methodology (analytics, heatmaps, user testing, surveys), hypothesis generation framework, test prioritization (PIE or ICE framework), A/B test design and statistical rigor, multivariate testing when appropriate, test implementation without breaking experience, segment-level analysis, winning variation rollout process, test documentation and learnings repository, CRO roadmap development, team collaboration (design, dev, marketing), and building experimentation culture.

prompts.title: Global Market Expansion Strategy
prompts.prompt: Act as an international business strategist. Plan market entry for [COMPANY] into [TARGET MARKETS]. Include: market selection criteria and prioritization, market entry mode (export, licensing, FDI, partnership), market research and sizing, competitive landscape analysis, regulatory and legal requirements, localization strategy (product, pricing, marketing), distribution channel development, local partnership evaluation, pricing strategy across markets, talent and organizational structure, financial projections and investment requirements, risk assessment (political, currency, cultural), phased rollout timeline, and success metrics per market.
